metadata.title: CVE-2023-31620 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in the dv_compare component of openlink virtuoso-opensource v7.2.9allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via crafted SQLstatements.

criterions.comment: virtuoso-opensource: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
